== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
leader:
  description: a leadership
  type: leadership
  leader:  # the leader
    - leader
  follower1:  # the follower1
    - value
  follower2:
    description: the follower2
    multi: true
    default:
      variable: _.follower1
----
